name: PopoverBackdrop
description:
An overlay displayed beneath the popover.
Renders a `<div>` element.

className.description: Class names applied to the element or a function that returns them based on the component's state.

container.description: The container element to which the backdrop is appended to.

keepMounted.description: If `true`, the backdrop remains mounted when the popover content is closed.

render.description: A function to customize rendering of the component.
